message.raw:
reorganizing atlas_description and irobot_hand_description install targets:

 * move meshes and materials from `atlas_description/gazebo/atlas/*` and `irobot_hand_description/gazebo/irobot_hand/*` into `atlas_description/*` and `irobot_hand_description/*`, making the source valid ros packages.

 * fix installed target under `${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_description/*` valid gazebo model (same for `irobot_hand_description`.

  • fix installed target under ${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_description/* valid gazebo model (same for irobot_hand_description.

message:
reorganizing atlas_description and irobot_hand_description install targets:

 * move meshes and materials from `atlas_description/gazebo/atlas/*` and `irobot_hand_description/gazebo/irobot_hand/*` into `atlas_description/*` and `irobot_hand_description/*`, making the source valid ros packages.

 * fix installed target under `${CMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX}/gazebo_models/atlas_description/atlas_description/*` valid gazebo model (same for `irobot_hand_description`.
